app_descript:
App Name: Gacha Life 2
Package Name: air.com.lunime.gachalife2

Brief

Unleash your imagination in Gacha Life 2, the highly anticipated sequel to the beloved dress-up game. Dive into a world of endless creativity where you can craft anime-styled characters and set them in dynamic scenes and narratives of your very own design. With unparalleled customization features, it's time to bring your unique characters to life and start a new adventure!
